sourcesContent:
import React,{useRef} from 'react'; import { useReactToPrint } from "react-to-print"; import '../../../App.css'; import Footer from '../../Footer'; import Navbar from '../../Navbar'; import './print_card.css' import {useLocation} from 'react-router-dom'; const Print_card = () => { const location = useLocation() console.log(location.state) const componentRef = useRef(); const handlePrint = useReactToPrint({ content: () => componentRef.current, }); return ( <>
Health Card
Health Card

Health ID:

{location.state.user.hid}

Name:

{location.state.user.firstname} {location.state.user.lastname}

Gender:

{location.state.user.gender}

Date of Birth:

{location.state.user.dateofbirth}

Information

Phone Number:

{location.state.user.phonenumber}

Blood Group:

AB +ve

Diseases:

Diabetes

Emergency Number

01621964493

); } export default Print_card;
